Question: The ____es joined the Obamas in New York City to mark the tenth anniversary of the September 11, 2001, terrorist attacks.
Hints: This person also became a member of the Skull and Bones society as a senior.
This person's approval rating went below the 50% mark in AP-Ipsos polling in December 2004.
Tony Blair wrote in 2010 that the caricature of this person as being dumb is "ludicrous" and that this person is "very smart".
